pages.privacy-policy: RedHorizon Privacy Policy - Safeguarding Your Personal Information RedHorizon HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to RedHorizon Hotel. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy describes our practices regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of information when you interact with our services, including our website, mobile app, and in-person interactions. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of personal information: Contact Information: Name, email address, phone number, mailing address Guest Stay Information: Arrival and departure dates, room preferences, special requests Payment Information: Credit/debit card details, billing address Technical Information: IP address, browser type, device information, website usage data Communication Data: Information you provide when contacting us (e.g., emails, feedback) How We Use Your Information We use your information for the following purposes: Process and manage your reservations Provide customer support and respond to inquiries Personalize your stay and offer tailored services Send you marketing communications (with your consent) Analyze website and app usage to improve our services Comply with legal obligations and industry standards Data Sharing We may share your information with: Trusted third-party service providers who assist us in delivering services (e.g., payment processing, IT support) Business partners for joint marketing initiatives (with your consent) Law enforcement or regulatory authorities as required by law Data Security We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Your Choices and Rights You have the right to: Access, correct, or delete your personal information Object to or restrict the processing of your information Withdraw your consent for marketing communications Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority The RedHorizon Hotel website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline RedHorizon Explore Home About Us Casino Contact Us Legal Disclaimers Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: RedHorizon Terms and Conditions - Guidelines for Using Our Services RedHorizon HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Terms And Conditions By using our website, booking a stay, or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services. 2. Reservations and Bookings 2.1 All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation by the hotel. 2.2 A valid credit card is required to guarantee your reservation. 2.3 Cancellations must be made in accordance with our cancellation policy to avoid charges. 3. Check-In and Check-Out 3.1 Check-in time is 13:00 and check-out time is 15:00. 3.2 Early check-in or late check-out may be available upon request and subject to availability and additional fees. 4. Payment and Fees 4.1 Full payment for your stay is due upon arrival unless otherwise agreed. 4.2 Additional charges for incidentals (e.g., minibar, room service) will be added to your bill. 4.3 All rates are subject to applicable taxes and fees. 5. Guest Conduct 5.1 Guests are expected to behave in a respectful manner towards other guests and hotel staff. 5.2 Any damage to hotel property caused by guests will be charged to their account. 5.3 The hotel reserves the right to refuse service or evict guests who violate these terms. 6. Liability 6.1 The hotel is not responsible for lost or stolen belongings. 6.2 Guests are responsible for any personal injuries or accidents that occur on hotel premises. 7. Modifications The hotel reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time without prior notice. 8. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at redhorizon@gmail.com The RedHorizon Hotel website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site.
